guides.bio: Manuel has been living in Idaho since forever. Really appasionate in looking for new adventures. If you like extreme sports he's your guy!

guides.name: Luther
guides.bio: Since he got an accident that changed his life for good he decided to give it a try and do something different that how he discovered the place and thanks to discipline he could get better and now he's a wonderful guide
